alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 18 at 1:28PM MST until December 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 50 to 60 below zero, coldest Thursday. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...A fast-moving system will bring light snow and gusty winds to the area Wednesday into Thursday. Snow and blowing snow, combined with the extremely cold wind chills, will create even more hazardous conditions.
info.instruction: A wind chill watch means dangerously low wind chill values are possible due to the combination of very cold air and wind.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
